description: The Salad Man & Juice Bar is a quick service food truck in Providence, focused on providing great food and drinks that are not only healthy for you, but also taste amazing.With plans on being a major contributor to a massive health shift for our nation, the menu offers fresh create-your-own salads, rice bowls and wraps with over 20 different toppings, including roasted chicken, fresh shrimp and daily specials. In addition, refreshing juice and smoothies using super-food ingredients are a wonderful compliment to to the fresh meals.
name: The Salad Man & Juice Bar
